name: volt-date
description: A lightweight date library to replace Day.js, using Native-First & Zero-Dependency philosophy

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist/esm --target browser --format esm && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist/cjs --target browser --format cjs && bun run build:types && bun run postbuild
scripts.build:prod: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist/esm --target browser --format esm --minify && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist/cjs --target browser --format cjs --minify && bun run build:types && bun run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: mv ./dist/esm/index.js ./dist/index.esm.js 2>/dev/null || true && mv ./dist/cjs/index.js ./dist/index.cjs.js 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf ./dist/esm ./dist/cjs 2>/dev/null || true
